originalText.text: I’ve been a customer since moving back to Inwood , first through dropping off myself and then through pick up and delivery.  They’ve been fantastic and I can always count on quick service, often within 24 hours.  I still love the manager on Nagle who is like family.  She is so warm and welcoming.  Overall a great business.

text.text: I’ve been a customer since moving back to Inwood , first through dropping off myself and then through pick up and delivery.  They’ve been fantastic and I can always count on quick service, often within 24 hours.  I still love the manager on Nagle who is like family.  She is so warm and welcoming. originalText.text: Horrible experience, i was a loyal customer until I started noticing the huge safety pins my garments had on them to stay attached to the hangers making holes on my expensive clothes. They offered a 30% that was never given. I was charged before I even went to pick up the garment n check that they did the job correctly. I pick again my clothes after complaining about what had happened and now I have a $300 skirt with holes on them from the huge pins they used to hang it again. As a professional dry cleaners people expect the employees that work there to know about basic fabric care and clearly the unprofessionalism is inevitable. Last time, I use their service.

originalText.text: I needed some alterations on a couple of belts. The Taylor did a great job! He put in slit in my new dress and I've had other dresses shortened at this dry cleaners. Always reasonable prices and great service!

text.text: I needed some alterations on a couple of belts. The Taylor did a great job! He put in slit in my new dress and I've had other dresses shortened at this dry cleaners. Always reasonable prices and great service!

originalText.text: I tried out the service and I didn’t like the fact that they couldn’t follow simple instructions I gave them for my clothes. I noticed they put way too many safety pins on each article of clothing, which created holes. Also, when I selected a delivery time, they would change it without notification and try to deliver it when I’m at work. I definitely would not recommend this company to anyone because it’s clear they don’t know how to follow instructions

originalText.text: Excellent service. Attendant is very polite and always ready to help and get your order done.

text.text: Excellent service. Attendant is very polite and always ready to help and get your order done.
